Paragraph.Text: The cryo hopper is a more expensive version of the standard storage hopper which can store 50 items and takes can process items very quickly. The cryo hopper main use is to stop ruined bug parts from spoiling, this the machine uses a decent amount of power to cool itself down. As the hopper gets closer to optimal temperature the power required lowers. You should place these in the cold caverns to save on power.

Paragraph.Text: For more information on storage hoppers please refer to the standard storage hopper guide.
